title: [K-12] Exploring Unsupervised Deep Learning-Based Thermal Management Chip Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic semiconductor process knowledge and thermal management principles
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented learning environment based on real chip design cases

learning_goals: Learners can understand the variational autoencoder (VAE) model structure and explain its application to layout generation.
Learners can perform a process of compressing 3D design variables into a 2D latent space for optimization.
Learners can validate the thermal properties of generated layouts using simulation tools and derive design improvement proposals.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
